metadata.title: Rooster 1 Wall Clock Farmer Kitchen French Home Decor
features: Ships Next Business Day from the USA
description: This wall clock measures 10 inches in diameter. It has a black plastic frame with a clear cover. Graphics are rich and vibrant and will last a lifetime. These clocks make a great accent to any room in your home or business. A perfect addition to your kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, family room or anywhere. The clock has precision quartz movement and operates on 1 AA battery (not included). Please take a moment to look through our entire clock inventory by clicking on "Other Clock Zone Products" at the top of this page. New designs added monthly, be sure to check back often.
